name: Doggo Dungeon
summary: Jump, Bark, Bite & Sniff your way through unique hand crafted pixel levels in this doggo dungeon action RPG! Misha's boy Ben has gone missing. She climbs into the well where he was last seen and enters a fantastical world biting off more than she can chew. Level up, clash with monsters, find secrets and clues to where your boy went. Along the way meet ghosts, goblins, a royal frog queen, and other strange things in your search for your lost friend.
